item.title: Use Stash to Backup PerconaXtraDB
item.description: Use Stash to Backup PerconaXtraDB Stash by AppsCode is a Kubernetes operator for backup and recovery of Kubernetes stateful workloads. Stash v0.9.0+ supports backup and restoration of PerconaXtraDB databases. KubeDB v0.13.0+ comes with built-in support for Stash. We recommend to use Stash for backup and restore your PerconaXtraDB databases instead of KubeDB’s native method. This guide will give you an overview of why you should use Stash to backup and restore your PerconaXtraDB databases.
